ygData.subject: Re: Bards questing
ygData.msgSnippet: Psah, Evil Deal Part 3 - my you must be a young one..  True Sci-Fi aficionados know this phrase originated in the 1951 Classic The Day the Earth Stood Still .
ygData.messageBody:
Psah, Evil Deal Part 3 - my you must be a young one.. True Sci-Fi
aficionados know this phrase originated in the 1951 Classic "The Day the
Earth Stood Still". This is a stunning film with serious cultural overtones
regarding the Cold War and is a serious religious allegory. If you never
seen it - make a point to...

Slyde
aka Dan Sniderman (my apologies - but I took a lot of film classes in
college)
----- Original Message -----
From: "Mike Roach" <mike.roach@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2000 9:33 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Bards questing


> From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
>
> If you take the secret phrase and turn it backwards, you get "nicto verada
> klatu" which some of you may recognize from Evil Deal part 3, Army of
> Darkness. Ash has to say this phrase before he picks up the necronomicon
in
> the graveyard. It gave me a chuckle.
